explanation: Reusable functions make main concise. triple multiplies its argument, average sums the inputs and divides by 2.0 to keep the fractional part. std::fixed with std::setprecision(1) formats the average output.
keyPoints: Implement pure functions that return values instead of printing directly.
Use 2.0 (a double literal) so the division stays in floating-point space.
Set the stream format once before printing related values.
